pow(12.0, 2.0) == 144.000000
pow(10.0, 3.0) == 1000.000000
pow(10.0, -3.0) == 0.001000
str: 123.456
x: 123.000000
str: 123.456
x: 123.456000
str: 123.456
x: 123.456000
123.456 123.456000 123 1000
sinh(2.0) = 3.62686
sinh(3.0) = 10.0179
h=2
atan2(3,2) = 0.982794
pow(2,4.0) = 16
16 / exp(0.982794 * 5) = 0.117493
3.93117 + 5*log(2) = 7.39691
cos(7.39691) = 0.441322,  sin(7.39691) = 0.897349
x     0.5x
x0.5     x
x   0.5x
-1e-17 == -1e-17 Worked!
